p: For the assessment of the cardioprotective and nephroprotective activities, C. intybus tincture (corresponding to 1 mg dry weight plant material/10 mL) was used, as well as two dilutions of the tincture, obtained with distilled water, CHT 1:1 (0.5 mg dry weight plant material/10 mL) and CHT 1:3 (0.25 mg dry weight plant material/10 mL).
